summary: "Girl with a Pearl Earring" is a famous painting by Dutch artist Johannes Vermeer, created around 1665. The painting shows a young girl wearing a beautiful pearl earring. Over time, it has had different names, but the current title was given in the late 20th century. This artwork has been in the Mauritshuis museum in The Hague, Netherlands, since 1902. It has inspired many books and movies.
title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
